news_items.content: Here is the rewritten news in a clear format:
**Related Questions**
* The BJP may name Tamil Nadu unit chief next week; Nainar Nagenthran, L Murugan among probable candidates.
* A 43-year-old advocate found dead with injuries; police launch investigation after conflicting accounts.
**Local News**
* A Tamil Nadu teen dies after an altercation on the school bus; police probe ongoing.
* Chennai news: Madras High Court judges visit prison in Chennai and issue surprise visit to a prisoner accused of sexual assault.
* Blood on MK Stalin's hands sparks political row; 100 gold pieces, SUV seized from Anna University student.
**International News**
* Myanmar earthquake death toll rises to 2,056; international organizations express concern.
* Breaking News: Fire breaks out at hospital in east Delhi; no one injured.
* Trump tariffs drag down Indian stock market; Nifty below 23,200.
**Health and Science**
* Gennova Biopharmaceuticals secures $13.38 million funding to develop Nipah virus vaccine.
* SoftBank Group agrees to fund AI research project for OpenAI; Alphabet-backed company raises $600 million for AI drug development.
* AMD closes $4.9 billion deal with investors.
**Technology**
* Vivo V50e Teased to Launch in India Soon: New smartphone features and color options confirmed.
* ServiceNow deploys AI agents to boost enterprise workflows.
* Applications; Industries
**ChatGPT and AI**
* Man files complaint after ChatGPT falsely claims he murdered his children.
* A.I. chatbots becoming popular but worry privacy advocates; latest news on this topic.
**Other News**
* New A.I. project explores mysteries of Delacroix, master of Romanticism; Eric and Wendy Schmidt and the Sorbonne fund a new program to digitize his work.
* OpenAI raises $40 billion in record-breaking deal with SoftBank; AI is a tool that can sharpen storytelling.
* Sam Altman says OpenAI will release an 'Open Weight' AI model this summer; Amazon's AGI Lab reveals its first work: Advanced AI agents.
